name: Acer C110 in Windows 8 by sbala214
short_description:
THIS PROJECT IS ABANDONED!!

Version 3.0 is now available
youtube link  https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Q1kT9vIwBgc


AN UPDATED VERSION WITH MORE FEATURES AND FEWER CRASHES AVAILABLE AT PROJECT WEB PAGE AS PAID APPLICATION for Just 20 USD 

please go to http://balas.asia/
contact sbala214@gmail.com

Features In Paid Application : 
1. Real Multi threaded application using all the cores of processor which provide smooth video playback in Full HD Monitor resolution. 
2. Memory efficient coding
3. 3d Gaming in Full screen.
4. More features like separate mode for each usage scenario 
5. Working Extended Mode functionality
6. Fewer Crashes and much more. 

This software enables pico projector to work in windows 8.
Starting Windows 8, Mirror drivers are not supported. This project attempts to make the pico projector work in windows 8 using libusb / winusb driver. 

My thanks to libam7xxx group and libusbdotnet group 


Hope this helps.
summary: This software enables Acer C110 Pico Projector to work with Windows 8
